Coster Balakasi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
A mụrụ ya na Harare nye nna Malawi na nne Zimbabwe, ọ tolitere na mpaghara Tafara nke obodo ahụ, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
N'afọ 1988, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ya na ndị na-akpụ ihe dịka Miger Padaso na Dominic Benhura na Tafara
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ya na onye na-ese ihe Cosmos Muchenje na Greendale, Hararae, 1993
N'afọ 1998, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Muchenje wee malite ịrụ ọrụ nke onwe ya
N'afọ 1999, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
O gosipụtala na Canterbury na Spain yana ebe dị iche iche na Zimbabwe. Balakasi nyefere ọdịnala nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Shona nye nwa nwanne ya, Gift Tembo.
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya gụnyere "Seated Girl", nke a na-egosipụta ugbu a na Knebworth House.
Balaksi bụ onye York's Shona Gallery na New York na Ukama Gallery na Vancouver, BC. na-anọchite anya.
